snippet.title: Targeted Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3075050/Targeted

How observant are you? Can you survive 10 days by uncovering clues?

As a former member of the Mafia, you're trying to testify against The Don, who's doing everything he can to take you out. To survive, you must search for evidence of sabotage in the underground garage where your car is stored to discover if anyone has been there before you. 

If everything is OK, you can get in your car, but if you see anything suspicious, turn back to the lift immediately and call for help! If you let your guard down, your life is at stake!

In this escape room-style game, you can put your observation skills to the test.

Targeted combines realism with the Noir experience in a Mafia-like setting.

The game offers multiple difficulty levels:

Normal: a balanced mode that can be completed in 10-30 minutes.
- Hard Mode: more levels and more anomalies.
- T-99 Impossible Mode: a 99-day challenge designed specifically for hardcore observers with unexpected twists.
- A paranormal anomaly mode will be added in a future update.

Replayability: More than 100 clues are waiting to be found!
How fast are you? With our built-in speedrun timer, you can compete with others and your friends.
Savings. You can pick up where you left off.
Play with your friends: Although multiplayer is not included, you can share control with friends using Steam Remote Play Together.
Achievements: do you like to max out your games? Targeted's achievement system will keep you busy for hours.
Low system requirements: The game has been optimized from the ground up for lower-end computers.

Are you ready for the challenge? Only the sharpest eyes can survive the day!

Be vigilant! In this game you are the TARGET!

When buying, please note that the game is played in a single location and can be played quickly, depending on your observational skills. However, thanks to our countless anomalies, it can be replayed several times, and can show you something new after several hours.

https://glitchyframestudio.eu
glitchyframestudio@gmail.com
